comments.body:

It seems this occurred at the 0.6.3 -> 0.7.0 JPype1 upgrade.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5728?focusedCommentId=16872638) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
